desc.en: Kotori comes to teach Sensei how to stretch. When Kotori starts stretching, it doesn't go as planned and she becomes disheartened. Sensei comforts Kotori and they continue to stretch together.
desc.jp: Kotori comes to teach Sensei how to stretch. When Kotori starts stretching, it doesn't go as planned and she becomes disheartened. Sensei comforts Kotori and they continue to stretch together.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚都梨}来找老师，说有东西要给老师看。{cf亚都梨}想给老师看的东西是伸展运动。{cf亚都梨}气势十足地开始拉筋，不过做得却没有预期中好，这让他感到沮丧。老师安慰{cf亚都梨}，一起继续拉筋。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Kotori arrives to help Sensei work through a pile of work. Sensei asks her to go on receptionist duty for a moment and heads to the restroom. When Sensei returns, Kotori is alone.
desc.jp: Kotori arrives to help Sensei work through a pile of work. Sensei asks her to go on receptionist duty for a moment and heads to the restroom. When Sensei returns, Kotori is alone.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚都梨}来找老师，表示要帮忙分担如雪片般飞来的营运管理工作。老师将接待工作暂时交给{cf亚都梨}，然后便前往洗手间。不久后回来的老师碰到了独自留下来的{cf亚都梨}。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Sensei finds Kotori in the lobby, exhausted. She is suffering from dizziness and tries to explain her symptoms. Sensei begins to explain the dizziness on her behalf, and thanks to Sensei's consideration, Kotori is able to rest.
desc.jp: Sensei finds Kotori in the lobby, exhausted. She is suffering from dizziness and tries to explain her symptoms. Sensei begins to explain the dizziness on her behalf, and thanks to Sensei's consideration, Kotori is able to rest.
desc.zh_cn: 老师总觉得{cf亚都梨}看起来很疲惫，出于担心而前往等候室。{cf亚都梨}晕眩症发作之余，仍想说明症状。老师代替{cf亚都梨}继续说明晕眩症，多亏有老师的照顾，{cf亚都梨}心情愉快地好好休息了一段时间。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.jp: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，因被用于美游的会议大厅而出名。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Kotori is reflecting on the aftermath of the games. As she laments that this wonderful moment will soon be gone forever, Sensei teaches her that things are precious because they will eventually be gone.
desc.jp: Kotori is reflecting on the aftermath of the games. As she laments that this wonderful moment will soon be gone forever, Sensei teaches her that things are precious because they will eventually be gone.
desc.zh_cn: 所有比赛都结束后，{cf亚都梨}依然陶醉于余韵之中。{cf亚都梨}因为这段时光不会再重来而感到遗憾，老师告诉他，有些东西正是因为不会再重来，所以更加珍贵。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

profile.en:
This member of the Engineering Department donned a cheerleading outfit to support her friends.

Her cheers are loud, upbeat, and—most importantly—filled with technical explanations.
profile.jp:
大運動会でみんなを応援するべく、チア服に着替えたミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、エンジニア部の部員。

元気良く明るい声で応援をする間も、いつもの説明や解説は欠かさない。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
千年科学学园所属，为了能在大运动会上为大家应援而换上了应援团服的「工程部」成员。

在以活泼开朗的声音应援的时候，也少不了平时的说明与讲解。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
为了在大运动会替大家应援而换上啦啦队服的千年科学学园所属，工程师部的部员。

在用元气满满的开朗声音应援的期间，平时的说明跟解释也没有缺席。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
大運動会でみんなを応援するべく、チア服に着替えたミレニアムサイエンススクール所属、エンジニア部の部員。

元気良く明るい声で応援をする間も、いつもの説明や解説は欠かさない。

gacha.en: Knowledge is always useful, no matter where you are!
gacha.jp: 場所が変わっても知識の価値は変わりません！
gacha.zh_cn_jp: 即使场所改变，知识的价值也不会变！
gacha.zh_cn_tw: 就算地点不同，知识的价值也不会改变！
gacha.zh_cn_cn: 場所が変わっても知識の価値は変わりません！

intro.en: Whether you need keen scientific insight or a spirited cheer, just leave it to me!
intro.jp: 解説や応援が必要なら、私に任せてください！
intro.zh_cn_jp: 解説や応援が必要なら、私に任せてください！
intro.zh_cn_tw:
需要解说或应援的话，
就交给我吧！

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Noa and Sensei return to the industrial lab to take a look at the newly built cheer bot. But when they arrive, they are greeted by the members of the Engineering Department wearing cheerleading uniforms instead. They confess that they had finished the cheer bot, but it went haywire and fled the scene when they tried running tests. However, Noa reviews the robot's blueprints and determines it must have been hacked.
desc.jp: Noa and Sensei return to the industrial lab to take a look at the newly built cheer bot. But when they arrive, they are greeted by the members of the Engineering Department wearing cheerleading uniforms instead. They confess that they had finished the cheer bot, but it went haywire and fled the scene when they tried running tests. However, Noa reviews the robot's blueprints and determines it must have been hacked.
desc.zh_cn: {cf乃爱}和老师回到工业实习室查看新制作的应援机器人。但在那里等他们的却是一身应援团打扮的{cn工程师部}。原来，虽然成功做出了应援机器人，但它却突然失控逃走了。{cf乃爱}看了应援机器人的蓝图，怀疑是被人入侵了。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

desc.en: With the Engineering Department in tow, Noa and Sensei head back to Veritas. Upon hearing what they have to say, Veritas agrees to once again help and track down who could have hacked the cheer bot.
desc.jp: With the Engineering Department in tow, Noa and Sensei head back to Veritas. Upon hearing what they have to say, Veritas agrees to once again help and track down who could have hacked the cheer bot.
desc.zh_cn: {cf乃爱}和老师便和身穿应援团服装的{cn工程师部}再度前往{cn贝里塔斯}。{cn贝里塔斯}听完事情的经过，便开始追踪{sn千年}学园内的可疑动静。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?

desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

desc.en: With the help of Veritas, Sensei and the students succeed in finding the Millennium students who stole the cheer bot. The students in question are a group who oppose the Kivotos Halo Festival due to their extreme dislike of physical activity called the Anti-Halo Festival Group. Backed into a corner, the rebellious students attack the group with the monstrous cheer bot.
desc.jp: With the help of Veritas, Sensei and the students succeed in finding the Millennium students who stole the cheer bot. The students in question are a group who oppose the Kivotos Halo Festival due to their extreme dislike of physical activity called the Anti-Halo Festival Group. Backed into a corner, the rebellious students attack the group with the monstrous cheer bot.
desc.zh_cn: {cn研讨会}一行人在{cn贝里塔斯}的帮助下，成功找出偷走应援机器人的{sn千年}学园学生。他们是一群讨厌体育活动，反对举办晄轮大祭的学生。为了阻止大运动会，他们这段时间一直在进行各种阻碍行动。这群「晄．反．会」的学生，利用从{cn工程师部}偷来的机器人对付{cn研讨会}一行人。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

desc.en: The powerful combat capabilities of the Track Crasher bring the Engineering Department and Veritas to their knees. When all hope seems lost, Noa comes up with a way to stop it in its tracks. The Anti-Halo Festival Group students in hiding are eventually caught by Sumire, finally bringing the incident to an end.
desc.jp: The powerful combat capabilities of the Track Crasher bring the Engineering Department and Veritas to their knees. When all hope seems lost, Noa comes up with a way to stop it in its tracks. The Anti-Halo Festival Group students in hiding are eventually caught by Sumire, finally bringing the incident to an end.
desc.zh_cn: 在「赛道破坏者」的强大战斗力面前，{cn工程师部}和{cn贝里塔斯}屡屡受挫。多亏{cf乃爱}想出来的点子，赛道破坏者才失去战斗能力，使战况得以反转。躲藏的「晄．反．会」学生也被{cf堇}一网打尽，骚动就此结束。

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?

name.zh_cn: 为大家举办的大运动会

desc.en: Sensei asks the students of the Anti-Halo Festival Group why they wanted to disrupt the festival so badly and listens to their grievances. Noa and Sensei make some revisions to ensure everyone can enjoy the field day in their own way. Afterwards, all of the Millennium students come together as one to prepare for the competition.
desc.jp: Sensei asks the students of the Anti-Halo Festival Group why they wanted to disrupt the festival so badly and listens to their grievances. Noa and Sensei make some revisions to ensure everyone can enjoy the field day in their own way. Afterwards, all of the Millennium students come together as one to prepare for the competition.
desc.zh_cn: 老师问「晄．反．会」的学生妨碍大运动会的原因，听他们诉说苦衷。后来{cf乃爱}和老师为了营造能让大家开心的大运动会，决定修改部分计划。之后{sn千年}学园的学生便同心协力努力准备大运动会。

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

desc.en: Yuuka wakes up from her herbal tea-induced slumber in a panic. She tracks down Noa, and soon realizes that her fellow students had worked tirelessly through the night to complete the Halo Festival preparations so she could rest. She thanks Sensei and Noa, and the Kivotos Halo Festival begins!
desc.jp: Yuuka wakes up from her herbal tea-induced slumber in a panic. She tracks down Noa, and soon realizes that her fellow students had worked tirelessly through the night to complete the Halo Festival preparations so she could rest. She thanks Sensei and Noa, and the Kivotos Halo Festival begins!
desc.zh_cn: 从睡梦中惊醒的{cf优香}慌忙赶到现场，这才发现其他{sn千年}学园的学生在自己熟睡的时候，帮忙准备大运动会。{cf优香}向帮助自己的{cf乃爱}和老师道谢……「晄轮大祭」顺利开幕。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.jp: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十二首曲子，尤其用于“故事”页及其下属页面中，以及每个故事的结尾（即“To Be Continued”未完待续界面）。

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
为大家举办的大运动会

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

desc.en: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.jp: There's only one day to go until the opening ceremony of the Kivotos Halo Festival. Will the students of Millennium be able to overcome unexpected setbacks and finish preparations to launch the field day in time?
desc.zh_cn: 距离奇普托斯大运动会「晄轮大祭」的开幕仪式只剩一天。{sn千年}的学生们能克服意料之外的事故，顺利完成大运动会的准备吗？

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.jp: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，因被用于美游的会议大厅而出名。
举例/联想：Let me think about it

desc.en: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.jp: Get ready for combat!Example: Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
desc.zh_cn: 全体就绪，准备战斗！举例/联想：Encroached Sky、Polyphonic
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
